eu.mais_h.mathsync

Class SummarizerFromLarge

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.mais_h.mathsync.SummarizerFromLarge
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Summarizer

    public class SummarizerFromLarge
extends Object
implements Summarizer
    Summarizer which uses a large (possibly cached) summary to generate smaller ones.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  SummarizerFromLarge.Supplier
      De-generified/simplified backport of java.util.function.Supplier.

    • Method Detail

      • summarize

        public Summary summarize(int level)
        Description copied from interface: Summarizer
        Produces a summary at a given level of detail.

        The larger detail level is, the bigger summary will consume on the wire, but the more information it conveys.

        Specified by:
        summarize in interface Summarizer
        Parameters:
        level - the level of detail.
        Returns:
        a summary of the current state at the requested level of detail.

      • from

        public static <T> Summarizer from(SummarizerFromLarge.Supplier producer)
        Builds a simple summarizer.
        Parameters:
        producer - function which provides (possibly cached) large summaries.
        Returns:
        a summarizer reducing large summaries.
